section.title: Translating plugin.xml
section.para:
Similar to the usage of keys in the application model, you can use the key prefixed with % in the plugin.xml file. The Eclipse tooling supports extracting existing String values from the plugin.xml file. Select your plugin.xml file, right-click on it and select
Plug-in Tools Externalize Strings
.

textobject.phrase: Eclipse PDE Wizard for externizing plugin.xml

section.para:
Via
PDE Tools Internationalize
you can also directly create one or several fragments for the result of the internationalization.
